wikipedia_page.main: Jackie Grant was an English professional footballer. Between 1946 and 1954 he played for Everton, making a total of 133 appearances for the club.

response: George Copeland Grant (9 May 1907 – 26 October 1978), known as Jackie Grant, was a West Indian cricketer who captained the Test side from 1930 to 1935. He was later a missionary in South Africa and Rhodesia.
